name: The Scraps of Victory
description:
In The Scraps of Victory you fight for your life against a horde of rampaging beasts who would like nothing more than for you to starve to death. Use your ninja-like reflexes to dodge the vile monsters, and savor your victory.

I’ve wanted to make a game like this for some time, a game which uses physics to make you balance something. There is just something so fun and chaotic about using physics in games.

This is the first game I've released which uses a combination of 2D canvas over WebGL. It worked surprisingly well.

Controls

You control the game using your mouse or touchscreen. Hover over the green indicator to start.
